actions.name: CreateLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create a data lifecycle policy to manage the scheduled creation and retention of Amazon EBS snapshots. You may have up to 100 policies

actions.name: DeleteLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing data lifecycle policy. In addition, this action halts the creation and deletion of snapshots that the policy specified. Existing snapshots are not affected

actions.name: GetLifecyclePolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to returns a list of summary descriptions of data lifecycle policies

actions.name: GetLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to return a complete description of a single data lifecycle policy

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags associated with a resource

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update tags of a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags associated with a resource

actions.name: UpdateLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing data lifecycle policy
